name: Skyline City Assets
description:
A collection of templates and highly detailed, modular, futuristic city blocks. The aesthetic is a futuristic city.

Use the templates as a start to your own game or extend on them to make your own creations. City templates are pre-made blocks that are modular and re-arrangable. Arrange the existing templates or use the base block template to create your own modular blocks. Make your city come alive with this as an artistic starting point.

Showcase Map: https://launch.crayta.com/play/fqgenrrb

Blueprint Name: "Skyline City Modular Templates"

Blueprint Forum Link: https://forum.crayta.com/t/skyline-city-assets-living-cities-jam/3139
